message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. For this exceptional item, I propose a price of $200. I trust it will provide you with significant value and return on investment.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. I believe that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. While I am committed to ensuring both parties receive fair value, I would like to respectfully suggest a compromise at $175. This price reflects the quality and benefits of the product while allowing us to reach an agreement that is satisfactory for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit hesitant to go up to $175. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $165. I believe this price is more in line with what I'm comfortable paying for the product.
